text: From Afar () is a 2015 Venezuelan Mexican drama movie directed by Lorenzo Vigas and starring Alfredo Castro, Luis Silva, Jeric√≥ Montilla, Catherina Cardozo, Jorge Luis Bosque, Greymer Acosta, Auffer Camacho. It won the Golden Lion at the Venice International Film Festival in 2015. == Other websites == * Category:2015 drama movies Category:Venezuelan movies Category:Mexican drama movies
